item.title: Autostart Tmux in iTerm2
item.description: This post will introduce how to make iTerm2 start into Tmux mode by default. By default, every time you start iTerm2, you need to enter tmux attach to enter tmux mode. I use Tmux to manage workspaces for different projects. Common IDEs generally provide an interface for users to select projects. Naturally, can iTerm2 + Tmux have a similar function? Very simple!
